description: To boost the performance, this sequence_mask is different with paddle.nn.functional.sequence_maskseq_ids (Tensor) – The whole sequence index, a tensor with a shape of [batch_size, sequence_length].valid_lengths (Tensor) – The valid length of every sequence, a tensor with a shape of [batch_size].Returns the output sequence mask mask.Its dtype is bool and has a shape of [batch_size, sequence_length].Tensor

params.name: seq_ids
params.description: The whole sequence index, a tensor with a shape of [batch_size, sequence_length].

params.name: valid_lengths
params.description: The valid length of every sequence, a tensor with a shape of [batch_size].

return.description: Returns the output sequence mask mask.Its dtype is bool and has a shape of [batch_size, sequence_length].
